title: PITCHING OR DEPITCHING MACHINES; CELLAR TOOLS  (cleaning of casks B08B9/00)
definition_statement: This place covers: Pitching and depitching machines, venting devices (for casks, barrels, and the like), cellar tools.

title: Pitching or depitching machines
definition_statement: This place covers: Pitching and depitching machines, typically devices for coating the inner surface of wooden barrels with pitch, or for removing pitch therefrom, respectively.

title: Venting devices for casks, barrels, or the like
informative_references: Details of beverage containers (e.g. casks, kegs) relating to container closing (e.g. bungholes, barrel bungs) Fermentation tanks for beer brewingBioreactors for continuous fermentation (beer brewing)
definition_statement: This place covers: Venting devices for casks, barrels, or the like.

title: Cellar tools
definition_statement: This place covers: Cellar tools (typically used in wine or champagne production).
